con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://localhost.io/movie-api/web-service" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://localhost.io/movie-api/web-service" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://localhost.io/movie-api/web-service"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://localhost.io/movie-api/web-service" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="listMoviesRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:integer"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="listMoviesResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="movies" type="tns:movie"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="addMovieRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="movie" type="tns:movie"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="addMovieResponse"></xs:element> <xs:element name="deleteMovieRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:integer"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="deleteMovieResponse"></xs:element> <!----> <xs:complexType name="movie"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:integer"/> <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="categories" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="directors" type="tns:director"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="stars" type="tns:star"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="director"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="surname" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="star"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="surname" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="deleteMovieResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:deleteMovieResponse" name="deleteMovieResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="addMovieResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:addMovieResponse" name="addMovieResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listMoviesRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:listMoviesRequest" name="listMoviesRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listMoviesResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:listMoviesResponse" name="listMoviesResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="deleteMovieRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:deleteMovieRequest" name="deleteMovieRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="addMovieRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:addMovieRequest" name="addMovieRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="MoviesPort"> <wsdl:operation name="deleteMovie"> <wsdl:input message="tns:deleteMovieRequest" name="deleteMovieRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:deleteMovieResponse" name="deleteMovieResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="addMovie"> <wsdl:input message="tns:addMovieRequest" name="addMovieRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:addMovieResponse" name="addMovieResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listMovies"> <wsdl:input message="tns:listMoviesRequest" name="listMoviesRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:listMoviesResponse" name="listMoviesResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="MoviesPortSoap11" type="tns:MoviesPort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="deleteMovie"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="deleteMovieRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="deleteMovieResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="addMovie"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="addMovieRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="addMovieResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listMovies"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="listMoviesRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="listMoviesResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="MoviesPortService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:MoviesPortSoap11" name="MoviesPortSoap11"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8085/movie-api"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:web="http://localhost.io/movie-api/web-service">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <web:addMovieRequest>\r <web:movie>\r <web:id>12</web:id>\r <web:title>Interstellar</web:title>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <web:categories>adventure</web:categories>\r <web:categories>drama</web:categories> <web:categories>sci-fi</web:categories> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <web:directors>\r <web:name>Cristopher</web:name>\r <web:surname>Nolan</web:surname>\r </web:directors>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <web:stars>\r <web:name>Matthew</web:name>\r <web:surname>McConaughey</web:surname>\r </web:stars>\r <web:stars> <web:name>Anne</web:name> <web:surname>Hathaway</web:surname> </web:stars> <web:stars> <web:name>Timoth√©e</web:name> <web:surname>Chalamet</web:surname> </web:stars> </web:movie>\r </web:addMovieRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
